subject: help please!!
msgSnippet: i don t manage to install junit1.0,even if i add in the autoexec.bat: set classpath= c: junit.jar;c: junit i still have problems,and still have an error
messageBody:
i don't manage to install junit1.0,even if i add in the
autoexec.bat:
set classpath= c:\junit.jar;c:\junit

i still have problems,and still have an error message
like:
Can't find class test/textui/TestRunner

when i try: java test.textui.TestRunner samples.AllTests

i tried to install junit3.2 but i had the same
problems,also the documentation of junit3.2 doen't fit
it,for example the file:readme.html says to try the
command:java junit.textui.TestRunner
junit.samples.AllTests

but the problem is that the directory textui doesn't exist
in the junit3.2 package?
so how can i do?
thanx very much!
